name: Minimalungeon (Mini Jam #101)
description:
Minimalungeon is a minimalist puzzle game where you control the environment.

We created this game for Mini Jam 101.

Credits
  • Color palette: FUNKYFUTURE 8 PALETTE created by Shamaboy
  • Font: Silkscreen

This game was created using the Godot Engine. License information can be found at https://godotengine.org/license.
